data.title: RPG Video Games | 28
data.meta_description: Page 28. RPG video games sorted by release date. RPG bet on storylines and gradual development of characters through experience obtained in combat and conversations.
data.text:
Death's Gambit: Afterlife

RPG 30 September 2021

An improved and expanded version of the 2018 metroidvania. In Death's Gambit: Afterlife, the controls and combat system have been improved, new locations and previously unavailable bosses have been prepared, and the class and skill system has been tweaked and crafting has been expanded.

PCXONEPS4Switch

Rogue Lords

RPG 30 September 2021

Roguelike maintaned in turn-based RPG convention. In Rogue Lords we play the role of the Devil, who sows chaos in an alternative version of 17th century New England, with the help of his faithful Disciples of Evil.

PCXONEPS4Switch

Alchemic Cutie

RPG 28 September 2021

A fun RPG game in which we explore the unusual island of Wimba, dealing with the training of wild ... jellies. Alchemic Cutie is developed by Vakman and CIRCLE Entertainment.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4Switch

Dragon Quest: The Adventure of Dai - A Hero's Bonds

RPG 28 September 2021

Dragon Quest: The Adventure of Dai - A Hero's Bonds is a Japanese action RPG based on the manga Dragon Quest: The Adventure of Dai. The game features two story modes. While the first follows the events of the original, the second takes us to a new world.

ANDiOS

New World

RPG 28 September 2021

A MMORPG developed by Amazon Game Studios. In New World we visit a huge open world inspired by 17th-century South American colonies and the beliefs of people who lived there. We can play alone or with other players, fighting, crafting, farming and building communities.

PCPS5XSX

Diablo II: Resurrected

RPG 23 September 2021

Diablo 2: Resurrected is a refreshed version of the cult hack'n'slash game from Blizzard Entertainment, featuring visual and system changes and gameplay improvements to both the base version of the classic and the Lord of Destruction expansion pack.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4Switch

Medieval Dynasty

RPG 23 September 2021

Medieval Dynasty is an intriguing mix of Dynasty series of life simulators with action RPG and survival from the Polish studio Render Cube. We begin as a modest medieval hunter trying to survive in the wilderness to found his own city over time.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4

Deltarune: Chapter 2

RPG 17 September 2021

Deltarune: Chapter 2 is a continuation of the original RPG, which, although it seems to be modeled on the classics of the genre from the eight-bit era, turns many characteristic solutions upside down. Game was developed by the author of the original, Toby Fox.

PCPS4Switch

Gamedec

RPG 16 September 2021

Cyberpunk RPG developed by Polish team Anshar Studios, based on Marcin Przybylek's books. In Gamedec, we take on the role of the title detective who investigates crimes committed in virtual worlds.

PCPS5Switch

Dustwind: The Last Resort

RPG 15 September 2021

The console version of Dustwind, 2018's isometric RPG. The Last Resort tells the story of a mother traversing a post-apocalyptic wasteland with her daughter. When her daughter is kidnapped by bandits, the heroine sets out to take revenge on them.

PS5XSXXONEPS4

ATOM RPG: Trudograd

RPG 13 September 2021

A standalone ATOM RPG add-on that continues the threads started in the original. In ATOM RPG: Trudograd we talk and perform tasks for the inhabitants of the Trudograd city, and we also have turn-based battles.

PCPS5XONESwitch

Tales of Arise

RPG 10 September 2021

Tales of Arise is the seventeenth major installment in the popular Bandai Namco Entertainment jRPG series. Traditionally, we receive cartoon graphics and an arcade combat system.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4

Arboria

RPG 09 September 2021

Third-person action RPG with mechanics characteristic of the roguelite sub-genre, created by Polish studio Dreamplant. Arboria takes place in a science fantasy world, and the hero of the game is a warrior from the Yotun tribe, who has to save Father Tree.

PC

Encased

RPG 07 September 2021

Postapocalyptic RPG in isometric projection inspired by the classics of the genre, created in the Russian studio Dark Crystal Games. Players explore a huge structure called the Dome, trying to survive among the anomalies, traps and warring sides. The clashes with the latter take place in the turn-based system.

PC

Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous

RPG 02 September 2021

An indirect continuation of Pathfinder: Kingmaker, a classic RPG by the Russian studio Owlcat Games, which once again collaborated with Chris Avellone. In Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous we go to the dark regions of Golarion and the middle of the Abyss.

PCXONEPS4Switch

Kitaria Fables

RPG 02 September 2021

Kitaria Fables is a debut work of Twin Hearts studio. The game mixes elements of action RPG and farm simulator, slightly resembling My Time at Portia or Stardew Valley. The game takes us to the land of Canoidera, where we explore the case of darkness plaguing the surrounding lands.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4Switch

Marvel Future Revolution

RPG 25 August 2021

Mobile action RPG developed by Korean studio Netmarble, set in the world of Marvel comics. In Marvel Future Revolution we play as superheroes whose task is to stop a cataclysm threatening the entire multiverse.

ANDiOS

MIR4

RPG 25 August 2021

MIR4 is a free-to-play Asian fantasy MMORPG. Game focuses on PvP, allowing to participate in faction battles and sieges. Game was developed by WeMade studio.

PC

The Elder Scrolls Online: Waking Flame

RPG 23 August 2021

The next expansion for MMORPG The Elder Scrolls Online. Waking Flame from ZeniMax Online studio continues the storyline of the Gates of Oblivion and introduces two new dungeons, along with bosses, items and challenges.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4

Mortal Shell: The Virtuous Cycle

RPG 18 August 2021

The Virtuous Cycle is the first big expansion for the action RPG Mortal Shell. The expansion introduces new locations, enemies and items. There are also more high difficulty adventures waiting for the players.

PCPS5XSXXONEPS4

Young Souls

RPG 17 August 2021

A co-op 2D brawler enriched with RPG elements, in which players play as Jenn and Tristan - teenagers fighting against goblins and other creatures that inhabit an alternative reality. As they progress, the Young Souls not only learn new skills but also gain more and more equipment, which increases their combat potential.

PCXONEPS4Switch
